body.name: Updated Mini Projector with Bluetooth and Projector Screen, 9500Lumens Full HD 1080P Portable Video Projector, Home Theater Movie Projector Compatible with HDMI,USB,AV,Laptop,Smartphone
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 6 hrs 21 mins
features: 【With Bluetooth 5.1 Chip, HIFI Sound Enjoyment】Built-in powerful speakers, this portable bluetooth projector provides HIFI sound effect while watching movie in a Max 200 inches screen. The extra BLUETOOTH function is also supported to connect with your speaker or headphone wirelessly. Relax yourself in a private space, enlarge your happiness with our Bluetooth projector, just enjoy it! (Note: Bluetooth NOT support to connect with smartphones)

【50% Brighter Images than Similar Projectors 】2024 Upgraded mini movie projector equipped with 8000:1 contrast ratio, supported 1080p resolution, brings you a 50% brighter images than similar projectors in market. It provides you with a premium home cinema experience with the bigger screen and clearer image.

【50% More Clear Images than Similar Projectors 】2024 Upgraded Chips make this movie projector more clear than other similar projectors. Our technical department researched and upgraded the chip to improve the clarity of the picture, so you can enjoy the movie everywhere and anytime.

【Low Noise & Long Lamp Life】The Mini projector is lower in noise and more durable than previous models thanks to advanced fan cooling technology. Powerful cooling system cools the heat of lamp efficiently, extending the bulb life to 50,000 hours, which means you can use it more than 15 years.

【Multiple Input, Compatible with Most Devices and Phones】This portable movie projector is fit for playing videos, TV series, photos sharing, football matches etc. It can be easily connected with laptops, smartphones, tablets, USB drives, X-Box to enjoy big games. ★★★When connect with phone, please purchase an extra HDMI adapter. Please kindly note projectors with mirrored are incompatible with Netflix and Hulu due to copyright issues, you can use TV Stick to play Netflix.★★★

The projector cannot connect with phone via Bluetooth Bluetooth function is ONLY for audio transfer with audio devices, NOT supporting video sync with smartphones and computers. The phone, computer, and Alexa cannot connect to the projector Bluetooth. The projector cannot play Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, Hulu and other videos Due to HDCP(High-bandwidth Digital Content Protection) agreement, Copyrighted videos such as Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, and Hulu must be played through Fire TV Stick, Computer, or laptop. How to connect with ios phones? For ios device, you need to use the official Lightning to HDMI adapter to connect your phone with the projector. How to connect with Android phones? For Android device, if your phone supports MHL, you can use the micro usb/type-c to HDMI cable to connect your phone with the projector. If your phone does not support MHL, you should prepare a Chrome-cast to connect your phone with the projector.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is an economical and incredibly portable mini-projector
reviews.reviewText: This is an economical and incredibly portable mini-projector, it has a 720p graphic resolution capable of generating clear and bright images, it is ideal for watching movies at home or on the patio. The sound is very basic, typical of any projector in this price range, but this mini-projector allows you to connect to external speakers or headphones via Bluetooth. Operation is so easy and has a remote control (batteries not included). You can connect it to a PC/laptop (HDMI or VGA), mobile phones, flash drives, SD cards and use with an Amazon Firestick or similar. In short, it is not a projector for presentations, but it is a good projector for home use. High recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've had a few projectors over the years, this one out performs them all and is compact, lightweight, super easy to use. It can't weight more than a lb and is the size of a thick book. In seconds out of the box it was up. Hook a Roku stick to it and have all your stations. Bluetooth audio to whatever speaker or headphones you want--works great.Picture quality is solid 720p, good enough for sports and movies for anyone who is not a video snob (but then you wouldn't be paying just 60 bucks for a projector).As others have said, the thin screen/sheet they give you isn't the greatest. Works fine against a dark wall to brighten it up. But use a real screen, white wall, or thicker sheet and it's great.Brights are pretty good, darks are average. Like all projectors, low light in the room is best. But works fine in a bright room too for most normal sports/shows.Overall, love this. Super portable theater for the basement, garage, or outdoor parties.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute Little Projector with minor issues
reviews.reviewText: Pros:1. Great picture.2. Lightweight screen easy to install.3. Decent speaker sound- better than other projectors I've used.4. Multiple sources and easy connectivity (TV, computer, wired speakers).5. Lightweight6. Small size easy to carry and store.7. Seems durable.Cons:1. Didn't come with tripod stand.2. Remote batteries not included.3. Bluetooth didn't recognize any of my Bluetooth speakers.Analysis: Works well with HDMI and plug in speakers but Bluetooth an issue. Not the end of the world but that just means I have to keep plugged in speakers near the projector. I've played around with settings but still couldn't connect. I may try other troubleshooting but as it's supposed to recognize the speaker's Bluetooth right off, I'll just plug in the speakers for now. Also, every other projector came with a tripod stand. This didn't. I'll have to use my other projector stand for this.Otherwise I recommend this cute little projector. It's not expensive and if you can work around the Bluetooth the entertainment value is worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased a portable projector, and I am absolutely thrilled with its performance! Here are five reasons why I give it a solid five-star rating:Exceptional Image Quality: The projector delivers crisp and vibrant images, even in low-light conditions. Whether I'm watching movies, giving presentations, or gaming, the clarity and color reproduction are outstanding.Compact and Portable Design: One of the key features that attracted me to this projector is its portability. It's lightweight and compact, making it easy to carry around. Perfect for movie nights at a friend's place or business presentations on the go.User-Friendly Interface: Setting up and operating this projector is a breeze. The user interface is intuitive, and I appreciate the straightforward menu navigation. Even if you're not tech-savvy, you'll find it easy to use.Versatile Connectivity: The projector offers a variety of connectivity options, from HDMI and USB to wireless capabilities. This versatility allows me to connect it to different devices seamlessly, enhancing its usability for various purposes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EXCELLENT - turn any room into a media room in less than 10 minutes
reviews.reviewText: It’s all about the Lumens.!!I am absolutely thrilled with my purchase of the 2023 Upgraded Portable Bluetooth Projector. This device has completely transformed my home entertainment experience.First.. Because Amazon stocks this it came overnight, which means if you are planning a football party with a little planning you can have it on time.Second.. It comes with a screen, so while its bright enough to be shown on a wall, a screen will really make it so much better.Third.. This is so much lighter and brighter (and cheaper) than previous / other models. The technology has really improved everything and lowered the price.Fourth,. This takes every conceivable input that I could throw at it – HDMI, Chips, USB etc.. you can get data into it, and it will show it on a big bright screen. As I said its really about the lumens, think of it this way, its like having a room that is dark and choosing a 25 watt bulb ( competition ) or 1 100 watt bulb ( this projector ). The 50% brighter projection, thanks to the 5000:1 contrast ratio and 1080p resolution, enhances the overall visual experienceFifth.. The Bluetooth 5.1 chip truly delivers HIFI sound enjoyment. The built-in powerful speakers provide exceptional audio quality, creating a cinematic atmosphere while watching movies on a max 176-inch screen.Sixth..The added Bluetooth function is a fantastic feature that allowed me to connect wirelessly to my favorite speakers or headphones, providing a truly immersive and private viewing experience. It's a perfect way to relax and amplify happiness with this Bluetooth projector. The low noise fan is a huge plus,trust me on this when you are watching a movie a fan is the last thing you want to hear.In conclusion, the 2023 Upgraded Portable Bluetooth Projector has exceeded my expectations in terms of audio-visual quality, durability, and versatility. It's a fantastic addition to my home entertainment setup, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a high-quality, feature-rich projector.This is great with a roku box or a fire stick, or just your plain old cable. The key here the screen is HUGE and whatever you watch you will feel like you are part of it.. and as a real big plus when you are done watching you can take down the screen and pack this lil baby up and you can have your room back.Just wait till you watch football on it… What a deal, What a picture, don’t wait grab one for the holidays, or any day.. And enjoy TV the way it was meant to be LARGE and at a super reasonable price.. !!
